text: Miranda Lambert is no longer livin ’ in Oklahoma, and she ’ s making it known during her new Livin ’ Like Hippies tour. The country star set the Internet ablaze this weekend when she changed the lyric in her hit song “ Little Red Wagon ” from its original “ I live in Oklahoma ” to the new “ I got the hell out of Oklahoma. ” A clip of the performance went viral, causing fans online to begin asking whether or not the lyric change - up was meant as a dig at ex - husband Blake Shelton. When Blake and Miranda called it quits in 2015, Miranda moved to Nashville, while Blake kept the couple ’ s farm in the Sooner State.
